title: HEART KILLER
lyrics:
Lyric It's - HEART KILLER

[Romanization]

nan imi oraejeone jugeosseo because of you

neon nareul gipge mudeobeoryeosseo you know it's true
tikkeul hana eopdeon nae simjangi

saeppalgan hyungteoga nabeorigoseo

dogi saenggigo gasiga doda

neol wihae deo nalkarowojyeotdaji
You used me

You lied to me

You broke me

You killed me

I don't die, it's your turn now
I’m the heartkiller

I’m the heartkiller

I’m the heartkiller

meollimeolli domangga bwa

eodi irijeori sumeobwara

I’ll find you

I’ll hurt you

I’ll break you

I’m the heartkiller
nan imi kkamage tabeoryeosseo because of you
biroso wambyeokhi jaega dwaesseo you know it's true
aju yeolsimhi ttangeul pa

ja, nega muthil jariya

yeopeseo norae bulleojulge

tumyeonghan hyanggiro jilsikhal ttaekkaji
Nanana
Nanana
Nanana nananana

Nanana
Nanana
Oh

I’m the heartkiller

I’m the heartkiller

I’m the heartkiller

meollimeolli domangga bwa

eodi irijeori sumeobwara

I’ll find you

I’ll hurt you

I’ll break you

I’m the heartkiller
I’m the heartkiller



[Hangeul]

난 이미 오래전에 죽었어 because of you



넌 나를 깊게 묻어버렸어 you know it's true

티끌 하나 없던 내 심장이



새빨간 흉터가 나버리고서



독이 생기고 가시가 돋아



널 위해 더 날카로워졌다지

You used me



You lied to me



You broke me



You killed me



I don't die, it's your turn now

I’m the heartkiller



I’m the heartkiller



I’m the heartkiller



멀리멀리 도망가 봐



어디 이리저리 숨어봐라



I’ll find you



I’ll hurt you



I’ll break you



I’m the heartkiller

난 이미 까맣게 타버렸어 because of you

비로소 완벽히 재가 됐어 you know it's true

아주 열심히 땅을 파



자, 네가 묻힐 자리야



옆에서 노래 불러줄게



투명한 향기로 질식할 때까지

Nanana

Nanana

Nanana nananana



Nanana

Nanana

Oh



I’m the heartkiller



I’m the heartkiller



I’m the heartkiller



멀리멀리 도망가 봐



어디 이리저리 숨어봐라



I’ll find you



I’ll hurt you



I’ll break you



I’m the heartkiller

I’m the heartkiller
name: Its - HEART KILLER
